00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlColorNode - MRML node for representing colors.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // Color nodes define colors by describing not only the actual color 
00017 // value, but also its name and a list of label values.  One attribute of 
00018 // model nodes is the name of its color.  When the 3D Slicer displays 
00019 // label maps, it colors each voxel by looking up the color associated 
00020 // with that label value. Thus, when label maps are displayed on 
00021 // reformatted slices, their colors automatically match the corresponding 
00022 // surface models in the 3D view.
00023  
00024 
00025 #ifndef __vtkMrmlColorNode_h
00026 #define __vtkMrmlColorNode_h
00027 
00028 //#include <iostream.h>
00029 //#include <fstream.h>
00030 #include "vtkMrmlNode.h"
00031 #include "vtkSlicer.h"
00032 
00033 class VTK_SLICER_BASE_EXPORT vtkMrmlColorNode : public vtkMrmlNode
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   static vtkMrmlColorNode *New();
00037   vtkTypeMacro(vtkMrmlColorNode,vtkMrmlNode);
00038   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00039   
00040   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041   // Utility Functions
00042   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044   // Description:
00045   // Write the node's attributes
00046   void Write(ofstream& of, int indent);
00047 
00048   // Description:
00049   // Copy the nodes attributes to this object to a MRML file in XML format
00050   void Copy(vtkMrmlNode *node);
00051 
00052   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053   // Get and Set Functions
00054   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 
00056   // Description:
00057   // Get/Set for DiffuseColor
00058   vtkGetVector3Macro(DiffuseColor, vtkFloatingPointType);
00059   vtkSetVector3Macro(DiffuseColor, vtkFloatingPointType);
00060 
00061   // Description:
00062   // Factor of the affect of ambient light from 0 to 1
00063   vtkGetMacro(Ambient, vtkFloatingPointType);
00064   vtkSetMacro(Ambient, vtkFloatingPointType);
00065 
00066   // Description:
00067   // Factor of the affect of diffuse reflection from 0 to 1
00068   vtkGetMacro(Diffuse, vtkFloatingPointType);
00069   vtkSetMacro(Diffuse, vtkFloatingPointType);
00070 
00071   // Description:
00072   // Factor of the affect of specular reflection from 0 to 1
00073   vtkGetMacro(Specular, vtkFloatingPointType);
00074   vtkSetMacro(Specular, vtkFloatingPointType);
00075 
00076   // Description:
00077   // Specular power in the range of 1 to 100
00078   vtkGetMacro(Power, int);
00079   vtkSetMacro(Power, int);
00080 
00081   // Description:
00082   // List of label values associated with this color
00083   vtkGetStringMacro(Labels);
00084   vtkSetStringMacro(Labels);
00085 
00086 protected:
00087   vtkMrmlColorNode();
00088   ~vtkMrmlColorNode();
00089   vtkMrmlColorNode(const vtkMrmlColorNode&) {};
00090   void operator=(const vtkMrmlColorNode&) {};
00091 
00092   // Strings
00093   char *Labels;
00094 
00095   // Numbers
00096   vtkFloatingPointType Ambient;
00097   vtkFloatingPointType Diffuse;
00098   vtkFloatingPointType Specular;
00099   int Power;
00100 
00101   // Arrays
00102   vtkFloatingPointType DiffuseColor[3];
00103 };
